typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	contador as integer (1)
}
source(output(
		FechaExtrae as string,
		PEDIDO as string,
		SOCIEDAD as string,
		FEC_CREACION as string,
		centro_su as string,
		clasedoc as string,
		posicion as string,
		{Tienda/Cliente} as string,
		material as string,
		CantPedido as string,
		Temporada as string,
		{aï¿½o} as string,
		cantEntrega as string,
		cantEmbalado as string,
		CantDespachado as string,
		CantRecepcionado as string,
		SinEntrega as string,
		enproceso as string,
		entransito as string,
		IndBorrado as string,
		IndEntreFin as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ZCLMM022
ZCLMM022 derive(FechaExtrae = toDate(FechaExtrae,"dd.MM.yyyy"),
		FEC_CREACION = toDate(FEC_CREACION,"dd.MM.yyyy"),
		contador = 1,
		cantEntrega = toInteger(replace(trim(cantEntrega),",000","")),
		CantPedido = toInteger(replace(trim(CantPedido),",000","")),
		cantEmbalada = toInteger(replace(trim(cantEmbalado),",000","")),
		CantDespachado = toInteger(replace(trim(CantDespachado),",000","")),
		CantRecepcionado = toInteger(replace(trim(CantRecepcionado),",000","")),
		SinEntrega = toInteger(replace(trim(SinEntrega),",000","")),
		enproceso = toInteger(replace(trim(enproceso),",000","")),
		entransito = toInteger(replace(trim(entransito),",000",""))) ~> corrigeFechas
corrigeFechas sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		FechaExtrae as date,
		PEDIDO as string,
		SOCIEDAD as string,
		FEC_CREACION as date,
		centro_su as string,
		Clasedoc as string,
		posicion as string,
		Tienda_Cliente as string,
		material as string,
		CantPedido as integer,
		Temporada as string,
		ano as string,
		cantEntrega as integer,
		cantEmbalada as integer,
		CantDespachado as integer,
		CantRecepcionado as integer,
		SinEntrega as integer,
		enproceso as integer,
		entransito as integer,
		IndBorrado as string,
		IndEntreFin as string,
		CONTADOR as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		FechaExtrae,
		PEDIDO,
		SOCIEDAD,
		FEC_CREACION,
		centro_su,
		Clasedoc = clasedoc,
		posicion,
		Tienda_Cliente = {Tienda/Cliente},
		material,
		CantPedido,
		Temporada,
		ano = {aï¿½o},
		cantEntrega,
		cantEmbalada,
		CantDespachado,
		CantRecepcionado,
		SinEntrega,
		enproceso,
		entransito,
		IndBorrado,
		IndEntreFin,
		CONTADOR = contador
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 20,
		FechaExtrae
	)) ~> sink1
